btnOpenFolder.label: Open Data Folder
btnOpenFolder.tooltip: Opens the folder which contains all files used by the script.

btnOpenBlacklist.label: Open Blacklist File
btnOpenBlacklist.tooltip: Opens the blacklist file. One username per line.

btnOpenWinners.label: Open Winners File
btnOpenWinners.tooltip: Opens the current winner list file.

btnOpenUnique.label: Open Unique Users File
btnOpenUnique.tooltip: Opens the text file which stores all usernames not eligable to win again.

btnReset.label: Reset Unique Users
btnReset.tooltip: Resets the list of unique users, allowing them to win again.

btnRotate.label: Backup Winners File
btnRotate.tooltip: Creates an empty winners.csv and renames the old one to winners_TIMESTAMP.csv where TIMESTAMP is the current time.

unique_users.label: Unique Users
unique_users.tooltip: Enable the unique user selection to ensure no user is chosen twice until the unique users list was reset or this setting is turned off.

whisperMessage.label: Whisper Message
whisperMessage.tooltip: The message which will be sent to the winner (randomUniqueUser) Default: 'Congratulations $user you have won $msg!'

send_whisper.label: Send Whisper Message
send_whisper.tooltip: Enable to automatically send a whisper message informing the random user who was selected.

parameter.label: Unique User Parameter
parameter.tooltip: The name of the unique user parameter used in commands

last_parameter.label: TO BE IMPLEMENTED Last Unique User Parameter
last_parameter.tooltip: The name of the last unique user parameter used in commands
